title: Keyword Research Tutorial For Amazon KDP 2025

tactics.name: midtail_keyword_optimization
tactics.description: Target midtail keywords for balanced search volume and specificity
steps: Identify midtail keywords with modifiers like age or location
Use tools to analyze keyword performance
Position book to convert midtail keyword searches
caveats: Short tail keywords face high competition
source_quotes: the best keywords you should actually go for is the midtail keywords. It gives you the advantages of the both worlds is big enough to get eyeballs on it and it's actually more targeted

tactics.name: analyze_bestselling_titles
tactics.description: Identify profitable keywords by examining titles and subtitles of top-selling books in a niche.
steps: Review 5-10 bestselling books in the niche
Identify recurring keywords in titles and subtitles
Repurpose these keywords for your book's title and subtitle
caveats: Keywords may shift with market trends
source_quotes: the title and subtitle of the bestselling books... contains the keyword

heuristics.name: midtail_priority_rule
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200 then boost midtail keywords
source_quotes: the best keywords you should actually go for is the midtail keywords

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_niches
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with lower competition
source_quotes: if you're in a profitable niche, it is easier... make money on Amazon

claims.statement: Amazon prioritizes products that convert best for specific keywords
source_quotes: Amazon takes that particular keyword and they find products that converts the best for people that have used that particular keyword

claims.statement: Amazon prioritizes book titles, subtitles, and backend keywords for indexing over descriptions.
source_quotes: your book description does not really matter in terms of the indexing

niche_patterns.description: Combines audience identity, specific need, and limiting factor for targeted keywords
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates midtail keyword opportunities with lower competition
source_quotes: position yourself to a point that when they see your book, they will want to buy your book
